Topic.Title: Surface now on sale at retail stores in US, UK, China and Austrila

Message.Msg: "Starting now, Surface RT are sold at many thousands of retail stors in the five largets countries in the world." Microsoft on Tuesday announced that the Surface RT tablet will be available at more retailers later this month, as well as at additional Microsoft stores that will grow beyond temporary holiday stores into permanent outlets. The announcement comes on the heels of lowered sales predictions for the Surface RT by analysts, with potentially only 600,000 of the tablets sold this year. The Surface RT, launched on Oct. 26, starts at $499. Surface tablets will continue to be sold at Microsoft retail stores in the U.S. and Canada and online in Australia, Canada, China, France, Germany, the UK and the U.S. Microsoft's holiday stores will be transitioned into permanent stores or specialty outlets. There are currently 31 Microsoft stores and 34 holiday specialty stores.

Message.Msg: why do YOU need to talk about it now? no one here is using tragedy for anything. Door to door taking of every gun is my solution, and retract the 2nd and toss it out the window. The founders would. not be so soft as that on out of control gun ownership. You're not that old 60 isn't old at all, I'm older than you. My Dad was a avid hunter. Chasing antelope across the Colorado prairie with his Dodge. I hated it and don't even like to kill a spider. I don't know why he liked it, killing a defenseless animal by pulling a trigger isn't my way of fun. Another solution is to own a gun, you get shot with it to see how it feels.

Topic.Title: NRA bags 26 more- 18 kindergarten children

Message.Msg: You bet there is a solution- lock up the leaders of the NRA for life, and enact and enforce meaningful gun control. The number of gun deaths in the US would decline to a fraction of what it is today and would very closely resemble the numbers of gun deaths in Europe To enforce meaningful gun laws means a lot of ignorant rednecks would spend most of their lives in jail or in insane asylums. An end to gun trading at the gun shows where background checks are not required would be one of the biggest aids to keeping guns out of the hands of the #$%$ and criminals

Topic.Title: NRA bags 26 more- 18 kindergarten children

Message.Msg: In the US, more gun control does not correlate to fewer gun deaths. In fact, the reverse is true. Additionally, where concealed carry has been legalized, crime has reduced. If gun control is the answer, explain that.
